name: Age of Dwarves
description:
Lead your Dwarves in the exploration of unknown mines and caverns, deep below the surface!

Dig out precious minerals, build a city underground and fight the menace that is lurking in the tunnels.

Investigate deeper and deeper into the bowels of the earth to discover what secrets lie ahead…

All assets and resources in the game were built from scratch in under 72 hours for the game jam.
